data.comment: The match has started.
Can Nice get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Angers's half?
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Angers.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jeremy Stinat awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 5, Angers to take a throw-in in Nice territory.
Angers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Nice in the half of Angers.
In the minute 7, Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nice's Hassane Kamara misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
In the minute 10, Nice drive upfield and Pierre Lees-Melou gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Angers defender.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Jeremy Stinat.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Jeremy Stinat.
In the minute 11, In Angers, Amine Gouiri of Nice is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Nice.
Goal! Rony Lopes gives Nice a 0-1 lead in Angers.
In the minute 12, That's a fine assist from Dante.
Throw-in Nice.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
In the minute 15, Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Angers in their own half.
In Angers a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Angelo Fulgini of Angers smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Angers.
Angelo Fulgini (Angers) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Angers are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 22, Penalty! Jeremy Stinat points to the spot, great chance for Nice...
Paul Bernardoni is booked for the home team.
Nice are going well in Angers. They now lead 0-2 thanks to a Pierre Lees-Melou penalty.
In the minute 25, Souleyman Doumbia for Angers gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Angers.
In the minute 27, Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Nice in their own half.
Jeremy Stinat signals a Nice throw-in in Angers's half.
Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Nice just outside Angers's area.
In the minute 33, Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Angers to take a throw-in in Nice territory.
Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Free kick for Angers in their own half.
In the minute 35, Souleyman Doumbia (Angers) has received a yellow card from Jeremy Stinat.
Free kick Angers.
In the minute 36, Robson Bambu (Nice) gets a yellow card.
Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Nice at Stade Raymond Kopa.
In the minute 38, Can Nice get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Angers's half?
Ball safe as Angers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball safe as Nice is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 39, Jeremy Stinat signals a Angers throw-in in Nice's half.
Throw-in for Nice at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Angers in their own half.
In the minute 40, Rony Lopes for Nice has been booked by Jeremy Stinat and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Nice are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 42, Throw-in Angers.
Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Nice in the half of Angers.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Angers in the half of Nice.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Nice in their own half.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Nice to take a throw-in in Angers territory.
Angers have been awarded a corner by Jeremy Stinat.
In the minute 45, Ismael Traore (Angers) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Nice defenders.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Nice close to the penalty box.
Angers have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Nice awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Angers in the half of Nice.
Sada Thioub is replacing Jimmy Cabot for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Angers in the half of Nice.
In Angers, Sada Thioub (Angers) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Angers.
In the minute 48, Angers have been awarded a corner by Jeremy Stinat.
Corner awarded to Angers.
Jeremy Stinat awards Nice a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Important block from the Angers defence as Rony Lopes fires in a strike for Nice.
Corner awarded to Nice.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Dante.
In the minute 55, The away team has substituted Dante with Flavius Daniliuc. Patrick Vieira is thus making his first change.
Angers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jeremy Stinat signals a Angers throw-in in Nice's half.
In the minute 57, Ball safe as Angers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Angers.
Can Angers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nice's half?
In the minute 59, Nice needs to be cautious. Angers have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Angers in their own half.
Angers surge into the attack at Stade Raymond Kopa but Sada Thioubâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 60, It's a goal kick for the away team in Angers.
Throw-in for Angers in the half of Nice.
Angers's Angelo Fulgini is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 64, Angers have been awarded a corner by Jeremy Stinat.
Nice drives forward and Amine Gouiri gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in Nice.
In the minute 67, Kasper Dolberg is replacing Jeff Reine-Adelaide for the away team.
Patrick Vieira (Nice) is making a third substitution, with Hicham Boudaoui replacing Rony Lopes.
Stephane Bahoken is on a sub for Lois Diony for Angers.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Nice at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Jeremy Stinat.
Nice will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Angers.
In the minute 72, Jeremy Stinat awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Angers pushes forward through Stephane Bahoken, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 75, Nice's Pierre Lees-Melou gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Angers make their third substitution with Mathias Pereira Lage replacing Sofiane Boufal.
In the minute 76, The home team replace Ibrahim Amadou with Lassana Coulibaly.
Angers drives forward and Lassana Coulibaly gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Goal! Nice extend their lead to 0-3 through Hicham Boudaoui.
In the minute 77, Amine Gouiri with an assist there.
Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Ball safe as Angers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 80, Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Nice.
Angers's Lassana Coulibaly has been booked in Angers.
In the minute 84, Corner awarded to Angers.
Angers make their fifth substitution with Mohamed Ali Cho replacing Angelo Fulgini.
Corner awarded to Angers.
Jeremy Stinat signals a Angers throw-in in Nice's half.
In the minute 85, The away team have replaced Jordan Lotomba with Youcef Atal. This is the fourth substitution made today by Patrick Vieira.
Kephren Thuram Ulien is on a sub for Amine Gouiri for Nice.
In Angers a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Nice's Kasper Dolberg goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Jeremy Stinat awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 87, At Stade Raymond Kopa, Romain Thomas has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 88, Angers to take a throw-in in Nice territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Nice get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Angers's half?
The 2nd half is prolonged by 8 minutes of added time.
Free kick Nice.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Throw-in for Nice at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Angers's Sada Thioub gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Nice defender.
Angers have been awarded a corner by Jeremy Stinat.
Angers push forward at Stade Raymond Kopa and Mohamed Ali Cho gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Nice defence.
Jeremy Stinat awards Nice a goal kick.
Nice awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Angers Angers drive forward through Sada Thioub. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Nice in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's 0-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
Thomas Mangani (Angers) has received a yellow card from Jeremy Stinat.
